Package de.htw.inventur.repository

Interface ObjectRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Object,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Object,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Object,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Object>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Object,Integer>
@Repository public interface ObjectRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Object,Integer>
